name: Validate API endpoints for delete books, authors

steps.name: Set basic web application url is "http://192.168.99.100:8080/api/"
Set basic web application url is "http://192.168.99.100:8080/api/"
Set "DELETE" api endpoint as "authors/"
Set "Author" id is 1 and operation is "DELETE"
Set HEADER param request content type as "application/json"
Set HEADER param response accept type as "application/json"
Raise "DELETE" HTTP request
Valid HTTP response should be received
Response http code should be 200

name: Validate API endpoints for add books, add authors

steps.name: Set "POST" api endpoint as "authors"
Set basic "Author" details as "<particular>" and "<value>" below
Set HEADER param request content type as "application/json"
Set HEADER param response accept type as "application/json"
Set BODY form param using basic "Author" details
Raise "POST" HTTP request
Valid HTTP response should be received
Response http code should be 200
Response HEADER content type should be "application/json"
Response BODY should not be null or empty
Set "POST" api endpoint as "books"
Set basic "Book" details as "<particular>" and "<value>" below
Set HEADER param request content type as "application/json"
Set HEADER param response accept type as "application/json"
Set BODY form param using basic "Book" details
Raise "POST" HTTP request
Valid HTTP response should be received
Response http code should be 200
Response HEADER content type should be "application/json"
Response BODY should not be null or empty

name: Validate API endpoints for update books, authors

Set HEADER param response accept type as "application/json"
